title: 10/13/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/13/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to former Packers executive and SI columnist Andrew Brandt about the Jon Gruden situation. Does Goodell care that these emails were leaked? Nets Studio host Frank Isola calls in to discuss Kyrie Irving's absence from the Nets. Can they win a title without him? And ESPN MLB reporter Tim Kurkjian talks Playoff action. Would a Astros/Dodgers match up in the World Series be a good thing for the sport?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
